description: Named after a 70's band that used to travel and perform at lean-tos along the Appalachian Trail, the VanGrizzle is seasoned for sure. Actually, they just made that up, but what's pure fact is how a Merino Wool trail sock is at home in the elements – so you don't have to grin and bear them.
name: Darn Tough Socks VanGrizzle Boot Midweight Cushion Socks - Mens

specs.value: Hiking boots, backpacking boots, walking boots
